motivations.name: Wants Information
motivations.description: Trying to learn something from the party
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask probing questions and steer conversation to their topic of interest

motivations.name: Hiding Something
motivations.description: Concealing important information or a secret
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll deflect certain topics and may lie if pressed

motivations.name: Needs Help
motivations.description: Requires assistance but may be reluctant to ask directly
motivations.gmGuidance: They're hoping the party will offer aid or notice their plight

motivations.name: Testing the Party
motivations.description: Evaluating the party's capabilities, morals, or intentions
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll present hypotheticals or small challenges to gauge responses

motivations.name: Making a Sale
motivations.description: Trying to sell goods, services, or an idea
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll highlight benefits and downplay drawbacks

motivations.name: Seeking Allies
motivations.description: Looking for people to join their cause or faction
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll emphasize shared goals and mutual benefits

motivations.name: Delivering a Message
motivations.description: Has specific information to convey to the party
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll try to get to their message, but may build rapport first

motivations.name: Seeking Revenge
motivations.description: Wants retribution against someone or something
motivations.gmGuidance: They may try to manipulate the party into helping with their vendetta

motivations.name: Lonely
motivations.description: Simply wants companionship and conversation
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll try to prolong the interaction and share stories

motivations.name: Suspicious of Party
motivations.description: Doesn't trust the party and wants to assess the threat
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll be cautious and watch for signs of danger

motivations.name: In a Hurry
motivations.description: Has urgent business elsewhere
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll try to keep the interaction brief and to the point

motivations.name: Showing Off
motivations.description: Wants to impress the party or demonstrate superiority
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll boast about accomplishments and drop names

motivations.name: Seeking Validation
motivations.description: Wants approval or reassurance from others
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll share concerns and look for affirmation

motivations.name: Warning the Party
motivations.description: Knows of a danger and wants to alert them
motivations.gmGuidance: They may be cryptic if fearful of being overheard

motivations.name: Seeking Entertainment
motivations.description: Bored and looking for amusement or gossip
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask about the party's adventures and share local rumors

motivations.name: Recruiting
motivations.description: Trying to hire the party for a job
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll assess the party's skills and discuss terms

motivations.name: Intimidating
motivations.description: Trying to scare the party away or establish dominance
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll make veiled threats or show of strength

motivations.name: Genuine Interest
motivations.description: Actually curious about the party and their stories
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask thoughtful questions and engage authentically

motivations.name: Protecting Someone
motivations.description: Trying to keep someone else safe from the party
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll misdirect or lie to protect their charge

motivations.name: Duty Bound
motivations.description: Performing their job or fulfilling an obligation
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll be professional but may lack personal investment

motivations.name: Sizing Up
motivations.description: Assessing if the party could be useful later
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll probe for skills and connections

motivations.name: Deflecting Attention
motivations.description: Trying to keep the party from noticing something
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll redirect conversation away from certain topics

motivations.name: Stalling for Time
motivations.description: Keeping the party occupied while something else happens
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll drag out the conversation with digressions

motivations.name: Gathering Support
motivations.description: Building a coalition for an upcoming conflict
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll emphasize common enemies and shared interests

motivations.name: Making an Impression
motivations.description: Wants to be remembered favorably
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll try to seem impressive and generous

motivations.name: Earning Trust
motivations.description: Building credibility for future requests
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll be helpful and honest to establish rapport

motivations.name: Discrediting a Rival
motivations.description: Planting seeds of doubt about someone else
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll drop subtle negative hints about their target

motivations.name: Spreading Information
motivations.description: Making sure certain news gets around
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll casually mention the information repeatedly

motivations.name: Seeking Approval
motivations.description: Wants validation from impressive strangers
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll share accomplishments and fish for compliments

motivations.name: Covering Their Tracks
motivations.description: Creating an alibi or false narrative
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll volunteer information that paints them favorably

motivations.name: Assessing a Threat
motivations.description: Determining if the party is dangerous
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask about capabilities and recent activities

motivations.name: Buying Silence
motivations.description: Hoping to ensure the party won't talk
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll offer rewards for discretion

motivations.name: Setting Up a Frame
motivations.description: Arranging for the party to be blamed later
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ensure the party is seen in specific places

motivations.name: Relieving Boredom
motivations.description: Just wants something interesting to happen
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll encourage the party to share wild stories

motivations.name: Rehearsing Deception
motivations.description: Testing a cover story on strangers
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll tell an elaborate tale and gauge reactions

motivations.name: Finding Enforcers
motivations.description: Looking for people who can handle violence
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll probe for willingness to use force

motivations.name: Hiding from Someone
motivations.description: Using the party as cover or distraction
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll stick close and seem nervous about surroundings

motivations.name: Identifying Marks
motivations.description: Assessing if the party is worth robbing
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll casually observe wealth and awareness

motivations.name: Testing Ethics
motivations.description: Determining the party's moral boundaries
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll present hypothetical moral dilemmas

motivations.name: Finding a Scapegoat
motivations.description: Looking for someone to blame
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll suggest the party handle dangerous tasks

motivations.name: Assessing Investment
motivations.description: Determining if backing the party would pay off
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask about plans and track record

motivations.name: Collecting Leverage
motivations.description: Looking for secrets to exploit later
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll encourage the party to confide in them

motivations.name: Creating Witnesses
motivations.description: Making sure they're seen here at this time
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll make the interaction memorable

motivations.name: Evaluating Competition
motivations.description: Sizing up potential rivals
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll probe for skills and goals

motivations.name: Extracting Intel
motivations.description: Trying to learn specific facts without seeming interested
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll circle around the topic with indirect questions

motivations.name: Building Credit
motivations.description: Doing favors to cash in later
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll be helpful and remind the party they owe them

motivations.name: Appearing Normal
motivations.description: Acting natural to avoid suspicion
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll seem overly casual about serious matters

motivations.name: Completing a Dare
motivations.description: Proving they're brave enough to approach strangers
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll seem nervous but determined

motivations.name: Following Orders
motivations.description: Someone told them to make contact
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll be mechanical and stick to a script

motivations.name: Indulging Curiosity
motivations.description: Heard about the party and wants to see for themselves
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask direct questions about rumors

motivations.name: Expanding Network
motivations.description: Building professional connections
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll exchange contact information and names

motivations.name: Spotting Opportunity
motivations.description: Thinks the party might be useful somehow
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ask open-ended questions about needs

motivations.name: Procrastinating
motivations.description: Using the conversation to avoid their duties
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll stretch out any interaction

motivations.name: Establishing Contact
motivations.description: First step in a longer plan
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll ensure the party knows how to find them

motivations.name: Paying It Forward
motivations.description: Someone helped them once, now helping others
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll share useful information freely

motivations.name: Testing the Waters
motivations.description: Seeing if the party is receptive to an idea
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll float proposals hypothetically

motivations.name: Attempting Redemption
motivations.description: Trying to balance past wrongs with good deeds
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll be overly helpful and mention past regrets

motivations.name: Creating Their Legend
motivations.description: Wants to be part of the party's story
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll make the interaction dramatic and memorable

motivations.name: Issuing a Challenge
motivations.description: Wants to prove they're better than the party
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll suggest competitions or contests

motivations.name: Preventing an Error
motivations.description: Knows the party is about to make a wrong move
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll try to warn without revealing too much

motivations.name: Following Prophecy
motivations.description: Believes fate requires this meeting
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll make cryptic references to destiny

motivations.name: Running an Experiment
motivations.description: Testing a theory about people or magic
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll observe reactions carefully

motivations.name: Honoring a Debt
motivations.description: Owes someone who asked them to help the party
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll mention they were asked to assist

motivations.name: Seizing Last Chance
motivations.description: This is their final opportunity for something
motivations.gmGuidance: They'll seem urgent and slightly desperate
